description.content:
Build a High-Performance Custom Full Stake Website with a Full Stack Developer


I'm a seasoned custom web developer, react front end developer and full stack developer with over 4 years of experience, specializing in efficient, user-focused custom website development. Whether you need to build, rebuild website from scratch or Figma, I can create a fully functional, responsive, and SEO-friendly site tailored to your needs.


Technologies:


Frontend: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue.js

Backend: PHP, Node.js, API Development/Integration

Databases: MySQL, MongoDB

Frameworks: Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, Custom CSS/SCSS


I Offer:


  • Responsive Custom Website Development
  • Figma to WordPress Website, HTML/CSS
  • Front end Development, Backend Development
  • API Development & Integration
  • eCommerce Functionality + Payment Gateway Integration
  • Social Media/Maps/Contact Form/Subscription/Mailing List


Why Me?


  • Quality Work, Clean Code & On-time Delivery
  • Fluent English & Live Zoom Meetings
  • 24/7 Quick Support & 20 Days Free Assistance


Note: Please KNOCK FIRST before making any order; it's important to provide the best result.


Let's bring your ideas to life! Contact me to start building a top-notch site.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do I get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To start, simply reach out to me with your project details. Iâ€™ll review your requirements and provide a custom offer based on your needs and budget.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is Full stack Development, and why is it necessary for my website redesign?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Full stack development entails working on both the front and back ends of a website to improve its design and operation.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What types of websites can you build?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I can build various types of websites, including custom websites, e-commerce platforms, and Figma to WordPress or HTML/CSS conversions. Whether you need a new site or a redesign, I focus on creating functional, responsive, and SEO-friendly solutions.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to provide for the Figma to Website conversion?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Simply share your Figma design files and any specific requirements. I'll take care of the rest!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What technologies do you use?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I use a range of technologies including HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue.js for the front end, and PHP, Node.js for the back end. I also work with MySQL and MongoDB databases and use frameworks like Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you handle both frontend and backend development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, as a full-stack web developer, I offer both front-end and back-end development services. This includes everything from creating user interfaces to developing server-side logic and integrating APIs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you ensure the website is responsive and cross-browser compatible?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I design websites to be fully responsive, ensuring they work seamlessly across all devices and screen sizes. Additionally, I test the website across different browsers to ensure compatibility.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your process for starting a project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please contact me before placing an order. Weâ€™ll discuss your requirements, goals, and any specific needs to ensure I provide the best possible result.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What kind of support do you provide after the project is completed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I offer 24/7 support and 30 days of free assistance after project completion to address any issues or make any necessary adjustments.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can we have a live meeting to discuss the project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I offer live Zoom meetings to discuss your project in detail, ensuring clear communication and alignment with your vision.
